speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: But, I mean do you ever see anything -- and then you wonder why CNN is doing relatively poorly in the ratings.
politifact_statement: CNN, their ratings are going down.
verified_claim_article_title: Trumps Pants on Fire claim that CNN ratings are way down

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: And the other thing -- very important -- I believe wages will start going up, because we now have the lowest unemployment rate we've had in 17 years, so you're going to see wages go up, right?
politifact_statement: Wages havent gone up in a long time.
verified_claim: Wages "havent gone up for a long time."
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump said wages 'havent gone up for a long time,' but that's wrong

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: The crowds were so big, almost as big as tonight, that the people said right at the beginning, you know, there's something special happening here.
politifact_statement: This was the scene of my first rally speech. Right? The crowds were so big, almost as big as tonight.
verified_claim: Despite what Donald Trump claims, "there werent 15,000 people who turned out in Phoenix" to see Trump speak.
verified_claim_article_title: Rachel Maddow says Donald Trump exaggerated his crowd in Phoenix  Pund

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: The only time they show the crowds is when there's a disrupter or an anarchist in the room.
politifact_statement: The only times they show the crowds is when there is a disrupter.
verified_claim_article_title: Trump says the media doesn't show his crowds at rallies. He's wrong

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Arizona is a disaster in terms of the price increase of your insurance, 116 percent interest.
politifact_statement: Arizona is a disaster in terms of the price increase in terms of insurance. 116 percent increase.
verified_claim: Obamacare is "hurting people right now" with premium increases of up to 116 percent.

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: We've also obtained historic increase in defense spending to prevent and deter conflict.
politifact_statement: Weve also obtained a historic increase in defense spending.
verified_claim: We've achieved a historic increase in defense spending to get our troops the support they so richly deserve.

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: And in fact, General Kelly, who was in charge of Homeland Security, where people coming in down 78 and almost 80 percent.
verified_claim: The border is down 78 percent. Under past administrations, the border didnt go down -- it went up.

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: The New York Times essentially apologized after I won the election, because their coverage was so bad, and it was so wrong, and they were losing so many subscribers that they practically apologized.
politifact_statement: The New York Times, "they practically apologized."
verified_claim: The nytimes sent a letter to their subscribers apologizing for their BAD coverage of me.
